title: I no longer receive emails when a new Unity Cloud Build is created.

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am the owner of the project, but I am not receiving any update emails from Cloud Build.
  • All other Cloud Build collaborators are receiving emails. Why am I not?

sections.title: Causes
content: It may be that you are not receiving emails due to your notifications setting being disabled.

sections.title: Resolution
content: To solve this problem, you will need to enable your notification settings. You can find this setting via the following link.
If you are having problems doing this yourself, please contact Support by creating a new ticket here.

sections.title: More information
content: There is a Forum post on this topic here.
